creator: alexeys@inventigo.com
text:
Something like the following would work:

    <sync todir="${product-image-dir}">
      <fileset dir="${base-image-dir}">
        <include name="lib/*.jar"/>
        <include name="lib/*.zip"/>
        <include name="system/"/>
      </fileset>
      <fileset dir="other/dir" includes="system/config/"/>
      <fileset file="dir/launcher.bat"/>
      <fileset dir="${jre-dir}">
        <mapper type="glob" from="*" to="support/jre/*"/>
      </fileset>
    </sync>

creator: mbenson@apache.org
text: Maybe what this calls for is a <syncfileset> similar to a <zipfileset>?

text: Or a <mappingfileset> or finally just a <fileset>.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 4240 ***

with Ant's trunk in svn revision 718263 comment #4 can be written as

    <sync todir="${product-image-dir}">
      <fileset dir="${base-image-dir}">
        <include name="lib/*.jar"/>
        <include name="lib/*.zip"/>
        <include name="system/"/>
      </fileset>
      <fileset dir="other/dir" includes="system/config/"/>
      <fileset file="dir/launcher.bat"/>
      <mappedresources>
        <fileset dir="${jre-dir}"/>
        <mapper type="glob" from="*" to="support/jre/*"/>
      </mappedresources>
    </sync>

it still needs to get documented, though.
